data.name: RULE_NOT_SET
data.value:
No rule is set for the work schedule, so validation can't proceed.
Please provide a rule.

data.name: CANT_VALIDATE_BECAUSE_READ_ERROR
data.value:
The work schedule cannot be validated because there was a reading error beforehand.
Please resolve the reading error first.

data.name: SHIFTS_DATE_YEAR_NOT_MATCH_SCHEDULE_YEAR
data.value:
The year of the shift(s) date does not match the year of the work schedule.
Year of the shift(s) date: '{0}'. Year of the work schedule: '{1}'.
Please check the following shift(s) date: '{2}'.

data.name: SHIFTS_DATE_MONTH_NOT_MATCH_SCHEDULE_MONTH
data.value:
The month of the shift(s) date does not match the month of the work schedule.
Month of the shift(s) date: '{0}'. Month of the work schedule: '{1}'.
Please check the following shift(s) date: '{2}'.

data.name: SHIFT_DURATION_IS_NEGATIVE_OR_ZERO
data.value:
Shift duration can't be negative or zero.
Details: '{0}'.

data.name: SHIFT_CONTINUITY_VALIDATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: Only the operator work schedule type currently supports shift continuity validation.

data.name: PREVIOUS_SHIFT_MISSING_END_CONTINUATION_MARKER
data.value:
A required 'end' continuation marker is missing for the employee '{0}' on '{1}'.
This marker is needed because the shift on '{2}' for the same employee starts with a continuation marker.
Please review the following dates: '{2}' and '{1}'.

data.name: PREVIOUS_SHIFT_MULTIPLE_END_CONTINUATION_MARKER_FOUND
data.value:
Multiple end continuation markers were found for employee '{0}' on '{1}'.
Please review the following dates: '{2}' and '{1}'.

data.name: GAP_DETECTED_BETWEEN_SHIFTS
data.value:
A gap was detected between shifts on '{0}'.
Details: - Previous Shift: Employee '{1}' from '{2}' to '{3}' - Next Shift: Employee '{4}' from '{5}' to '{6}' - Gap: '{7}'
Please ensure that no gaps exist between shifts.

data.name: OVERLAP_DETECTED_BETWEEN_SHIFTS
data.value:
There is an overlap in shifts on '{0}'.
Details: - Previous Shift: Employee '{1}' from '{2}' to '{3}' - Next Shift: Employee '{4}' from '{5}' to '{6}'
Please review the timings for overlapping shifts.

data.name: EMPLOYEE_SHIFT_DURATION_IS_GREATER_THAN_RULE
data.value:
Employee '{0}' logged '{1}' time, which exceeds the maximum allowed limit of '{2}'.
Please review the following date: '{3}'.

data.name: COMBINED_SHIFTS_DURATION_IS_GREATER_THAN_RULE
data.value:
The combined total shift time '{0}' exceeded the allowed maximum of '{1}'.
Please review the shifts on the following date: '{2}'.

data.name: MISSING_REQUIRED_DATES
data.value: Shift data is missing for the following days: [{0}].
